title: Amazon KDP Niche Research - finding book ideas

tactics.name: Amazon Category Analysis
tactics.description: Browse Amazon's book categories to identify trending niches and bestselling titles for inspiration
steps: Filter by subcategories like children's books or cookbooks
Check bestseller rankings and featured products
Analyze cover designs and niche variations
source_quotes: we're really looking at these kind of categories here which is business and investing children's books cookbooks even maybe so let's just click on children's books

tactics.name: analyze_bestsellers
tactics.description: Identify trending niches by reviewing Amazon bestseller lists and categories
steps: Browse children's sections for coloring books
Check holiday-themed books for seasonal opportunities
source_quotes: Books that deal with the ocean... seem to be very popular with children

tactics.name: create_low_content_books
tactics.description: Develop simple, repetitive content books like workbooks or journals
caveats: Ensure originality to avoid copyright issues
source_quotes: Good Days Start with Gratitude... is a simple low content book

tactics.name: analyze_existing_books
tactics.description: Study successful books in a niche for design and content inspiration
steps: Observe cover design elements (colors, images, photography)
Review interior content quality and structure
Note recurring themes and formatting patterns
source_quotes: look at the ideas and the niches but also have a look at how they design their covers
read the reviews that people leave on other books

heuristics.name: Cover Design Signal
heuristics.condition: If a niche has low review counts but high visual appeal, prioritize it
source_quotes: i would expect this to do better if you had a really colorful cover

heuristics.name: low_review_boost
heuristics.condition: If a niche has low review counts, it may indicate untapped potential
source_quotes: Books that deal with the ocean... seem to be very popular with children

heuristics.name: content_quality_heuristic
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize content quality over quantity
source_quotes: you can't really build a business on that on amazon anymore
make better books make better quality books

claims.statement: Niche-specific cover designs significantly impact sales performance in children's books
source_quotes: colors always work really well for that kind of niche

claims.statement: Low-content books like gratitude journals can achieve high sales with simple formats
source_quotes: Good Days Start with Gratitude... is a simple low content book

claims.statement: Notebooks still sell but require strong niche positioning
source_quotes: you have to really create a really good niche

claims.statement: Low-content books are less profitable than higher-content alternatives
source_quotes: stay away from no content and go into low content and then into higher content
you can still practice with low content and no content if you are a beginner
